name: &AI
headline: Professional-Grade AI for Patent Attorneys
description: &AI is an AI-powered workspace designed for patent attorneys. Leverage agentic AI to accelerate entire prosecution & litigation workflows in one secure, collaborative workspace.

founders.name: Caleb Harris, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CEO of &AI. Previously, I studied CS + Neuro at MIT, did technical consulting in patent litigation for Fish & Richardson/Gibson Dunn, built out the data science stack at InsideTracker, and conducted ML research at the MIT Media Lab.

founders.name: Herbert Turner, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder/CTO of &AI. Previously, I studied Aero/Astro + CS at MIT, worked on autonomous surface vehicles and applied ML research, fine-tuned LLMs at Google, and was a founding engineer at Kino AI.

# Professional-Grade AI for Patent Attorneys
## Agentic AI for end-to-end prosecution & litigation workflows in one secure, collaborative workspace.
BOOK A DEMO
![Folder Icon](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/static/media/folder-navy.fed0f786.svg)
## Solutions for both prosecution and litigation
INVALIDITY
Drive litigation success
Understand the complete picture of patent validity in minutes with global prior art search and litigation-ready claim charts.
![Drive litigation success](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fdocument-search.63ba1d7a.png&w=640&q=75)
PROSECUTION
Save time for the complex work
Quickly check the novelty of invention disclosures, draft robust claims, and automate responses to office actions.
![Save time for the complex work](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fpros.0f8f73bb.png&w=828&q=75)
INFRINGEMENT
Pinpoint new opportunities
Obtain detailed insights into how products overlap with your patent or portfolio and assess monetization potential.
![Pinpoint new opportunities](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fclaim-chart.46adba11.png&w=640&q=75)
AI AGENT
Accelerate tedious workflows
Experience the first AI agent for patent work, Andy. Equipped with the full suite of &AI tools, Andy works as you would, on your behalf.
![Accelerate tedious workflows](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fportfolio.fcfec1ea.png&w=750&q=75)
WORKSPACE
Securely manage siloed projects
Ensure seamless collaboration while maintaining the highest level of security for sensitive material.
![Securely manage siloed projects](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/image?url=%2F_next%2Fstatic%2Fmedia%2Fproject.fc3c5f71.png&w=640&q=75)
![Folder Icon](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/static/media/folder-gray.774f8e03.svg)
## Frequently asked questions
Does &AI use customer data or inputs to train underlying models?
    No. We do not train on your data. &AI leverages publicly available data like inter partes review filings to validate performance.
How does &AI ensure the accuracy of results and manage LLM hallucinations?
    Claim charts, search results, and other work products made on the &AI platform are only composed of ground-truth information, not generated content. This eliminates the possibility of hallucination.
How does collaboration and project access work?
    Organization workspaces are siloed at the project level, and user-project access control is enforced. This means that only those with granted privileges are able to access or see the existence of a project.
What is the &AI data retention policy with third-party model providers?
    &AI has contractual zero-data retention policies with all third-party model providers. 
![Folder Icon](https://www.tryandai.com/_next/static/media/folder-white.df5156c0.svg)
## Professional-Grade AI for Patent Attorneys
&AI is trusted by multiple Am Law 100 members and backed by Y Combinator & First Round Capital.
BOOK A DEMO

generated_description:
&AI is a promising startup founded in 2024 and currently part of Y Combinator's Batch S24, headquartered in San Francisco. Its core mission is to harness professional-grade AI specifically tailored for patent attorneys, revolutionizing how they manage their workflows.

At its heart, &AI offers an AI-powered workspace that streamlines both prosecution and litigation processes. The platform combines advanced tools into one secure and collaborative environment, which can significantly enhance efficiency for legal professionals. Their AI agent, named Andy, acts on behalf of users, deftly handling tedious tasks to allow patent attorneys to focus on more strategic activities.

As of now, &AI boasts a modest team of nine, led by notable figures, including David Lieb, a Group Partner at Y Combinator. They are entrenched in the legal tech space, with a clear B2B SaaS orientation. Their offerings cater to critical areas such as invalidity assessments, prosecution tasks, and infringement analyses. This means users can quickly check the novelty of inventions, drive litigation success through comprehensive validity insights, and identify monetization opportunities—all facilitated by robust AI technology.

Moreover, &AI places a high priority on data security and user privacy, ensuring that customer data isn't used to train its models and adhering to strict zero-data retention policies with third-party providers. 

In a landscape where efficiency and accuracy are paramount, &AI is carving out a niche that not only meets the needs of patent attorneys but also stands to redefine how legal workflows are managed. As they continue to grow, it will be exciting to see how they innovate further in the legal tech field. 

For more information, you can visit their website at [andai.com](https://www.tryandai.com).
